text: This is a List of Privy Counsellors of the United Kingdom appointed during the reign of King George V, from 1910 to 1936. The first woman to serve on the Council, Margaret Bondfield, was appointed during this period (1929). ==King George V== ===1910=== *Sir Samuel Thomas Evans (1859–1918) *Prince Arthur of Connaught (1883–1938) *The Lord Knollys (1837–1924) *Hon.
